verbs.description: As [ARG1: conflicts over tariffs] [V: loom] [ARGM-LOC: over the G7 summit in Quebec] , diplomacy between Donald Trump ’s United States and its Western allies is devolving into a reality show feud .
As conflicts over tariffs loom over the G7 summit in Quebec , diplomacy between Donald Trump ’s United States and its Western allies [V: is] devolving into a reality show feud .

[ARGM-TMP: As conflicts over tariffs loom over the G7 summit in Quebec] , [ARG1: diplomacy between Donald Trump ’s United States and its Western allies] is [V: devolving] [ARG2: into a reality show feud] .
